mapper.sql:
FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND codeSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeGroupSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.name ,a.enName ,a.replaceCode ,a.codeGroupSeq ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,a.delNy
ORDER BY a.codeSeq DESC
SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.name ,a.enName ,a.replaceCode ,a.codeGroupSeq ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,a.delNy FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeSeq = #{codeSeq}
SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.name ,a.enName ,a.replaceCode ,a.codeGroupSeq ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,a.delNy FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND a.replaceCode = #{replaceCode}
SELECT codeSeq ,replaceCode ,name ,enName ,codeGroupSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0
